desc.p: • Check file to specify the associated Rating Agency from EB.RATING.AGENCY.
• A minimum of 3 alphanumeric characters and maximum of 35 alphanumeric characters can be entered.
Valid ID for the Rating table.
• A minimum of 1 alphanumeric characters and maximum of 5 alphanumeric characters can be entered
• The input options available in the field are STRONG_GOOD_SATISFACTORY_WEAK_DEFAULT
